=The installation guide of Symphony development plugin.=

== Introduction ==

Requirement Environment: Eclipse3.4+, Java5+, Symphony1+

== Details ==

  #. download com.ibm.hannover.tools_xxx.jar from [http://code.google.com/p/kane-toolkit/downloads/list?can=3&q=&colspec=Filename+Summary+Uploaded+Size+DownloadCount Downloads] page;
  #. put the jar under your plugin folder of eclipse, or p2 folder
